name: inLIFE
description:
We develop effective web solutions for clients of all sizes from small local businesses looking for affordable web design to full projects for well known clients such as 50Cent, Universal, Takethat, FIFA, VIBE, Fastcar magazine & more. With over 14 years experience and recognised accreditations we don't just stop at providing web design services.
At inLIFE we specialise in effective online marketing solutions including social networking campaigns, online video, iphone apps, search engine optimisation, digital advertising pr campaigns and more. We also also work closely with a number of companies nationwide providing white label services. Please contact us if this may be of interest you.Â 
READ MORE...

locations.address: 3 Blake Court, Cobbett Road Burntwood Business Park
